participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Sensitive, nurturing, and creative. Enjoys quiet moments and finds peace in small activities.
participant_1.background: i'm scared of dying. knitting is my passion. i've a dogs. the county wide bake sale is where i feel most at home.

participant_2.name: Mohamed
participant_2.personality: Resilient, resourceful, and determined. Values freedom and the importance of family.
participant_2.background: i was forced to marry when i was a. my aunt helped me escape when i was of. i was born in somalia. now i live in the united states.

content.text: I am fine . What about you ?
I'm doing well, thank you. How are you?
